description:
Arch Linux-based Garuda Linux “Broadwing” distribution is now available for download with new Welcome app, new Mokka edition, and more. Here's what's new!

The post Garuda Linux “Broadwing” Released with New Mokka Edition, New Welcome App appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Garuda Linux “Broadwing” Released with New Mokka Edition, New Welcome App
